Producer: Richard Arlook, Rachel Brenna, Benjamin Kruger
Synopsis: Sonia (Cristin Milioti), a neurotic and charming jingle writer, dreams of having an exciting life. The sudden marriage proposal and subsequent ultimatum from her easygoing boyfriend (Dan Soder) force Sonia to confront whether she wants to join the ranks of her married friends or pursue her fantasies.
Title: It Had to Be You
